japanese: そ、そうだね……/（それよりも、胸の星型が目に毒だ……）
english: W-well yeah... /(More than that, the star on her chest is bad for my eyes...)

japanese: そういや委員長、/帰宅部の監督は辞めたの？
english: Speaking of which, Chairperson, /quit being home club advisor?

japanese: そ、そうね……/（それよりも、/　胸の星型が目にイタイわ……）
english: W-well... /(More than that, /the star on her chest hurts my eyes...)

japanese: そういう事なら、/佐渡先生に甘えてきたら？
english: If that's the case, /why not rely on Sado-sensei?

japanese: そうか……。/では、共に行こう。
english: I see... /Well then, let's go together.

japanese: そういうときは、/勇気が必要ね。
english: At times like that, /you need courage.

japanese: そういえば、/ゆりかさんと九郎って、/姉弟なんですよね？
english: Speaking of which, /Yurika-san and Kuro are /siblings, right?

japanese: そう……よね。/去年はあんなに帰りたがってたモノね。
english: Yeah... right. /Last year you wanted to go home so badly.

japanese: そういう時は、響子先生の/バキバキッと整体をうけるといいですよ。/調子がよくなりますから。
english: At times like that, Kyoko-sensei's /crack-crack bodywork is good. /It'll help you feel better.

japanese: そういう線もあったな。/でも違うんだよ。
english: That was one possibility. /But that's not it.

japanese: そういえば、/どうしてひなたは靴を飛ばすの？/もって歩くのも大変そうなのに。
english: Speaking of which, /why does Hinata throw her shoes? /Carrying them seems tough.

japanese: そういうときは、/勇気が必要だな。
english: At times like that, /you need courage.

japanese: そういうものなのか？/よくは判らないけど……いくぞ！！
english: Is that how it is? /Don't really get it, but... let's go!!

japanese: そういうものなの？/よくは判らないけど……いくわよ！！
english: Is that how it is? /Don't really get it, but... let's go!!

japanese: そう……だよな。/去年はあんなに帰りたがってたモンな。
english: Yeah... right. /Last year you wanted to go home so badly.

japanese: そういえば、/どうしてひなたは靴を飛ばすんだ？/もって歩くのも大変そうなのに。
english: Speaking of which, /why does Hinata throw her shoes? /Carrying them seems tough.

japanese: そ、そんな顔すんなよ！/照れるじゃねェかよ……。
english: D-don't make that face! /You're making me blush...

japanese: そう、デスか……
english: Yeah, is that so...

japanese: そういやぁ、/喫茶店をやるってハリキッてたねぇ。
english: Speaking of which, /you were really into the cafe.

japanese: そうか……/女だし、当たり前よね。/ゴメンね、軽はずみな事を言っちゃって。
english: I see... /she's a girl, of course. /Sorry for saying something thoughtless.

japanese: そういえばバツって、/よく二年生に進級できたな。/テストで赤点たくさんもらってたのに。
english: Speaking of which, Batsu /made it to second year. /Even with all those failing grades.

japanese: そう……。/……その人、いい人？
english: Yeah... /...Is that person nice?

japanese: そう、信じてるからな！
english: Yeah, I believe in you!
